channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 ways to help your child retire with $1 million — or more
item.description: One financial strategy claims investing $1,544 for a child at birth can help them retire with $1 million. Could it be that simple?

item.title: Chipotle says that consumer confidence took a hit in Q2. The stock is sliding.
item.description: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. fell about 10% in extended trading after the company’s same-restaurant sales declined in the second quarter by m...

item.title: Why is IBM’s stock down after an earnings beat? Here’s one quibble.
item.description: The company beat revenue expectations in consulting and infrastructure — but it didn’t deliver upside for its software segment.

item.title: ServiceNow CEO warns of ‘extinction’ for some legacy software as stock pops on earnings
item.description: The enterprise-software company beat expectations with its latest earnings and boosted its outlook.

item.title: ‘I’m already up $45,000 in about an hour’ — Reddit traders boast about wins as meme-stock mania returns

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
